text: Aclaimant | Remote USA | Full Stack Clojure(Script Engineers) | Remote Aclaimant is looking for a mid-level Clojure developer to join our team. At Aclaimant we are redefining the way companies and employees work together to manage risk. Our SaaS platform is built using Clojure and ClojureScript. We work remotely from the comfort of our own homes. Pair programming is important to us; it helps us build culture and share knowledge. We expect candidates to be located within North America. Email jobs@aclaimant.com for more information or visit https://aclaimant.com/careers-developer
